snippet: The review said the Obama administration had not sufficiently explained how it would shift military forces and how it would pay for the moves.
abstract: Independent review by the Center for Strategic and International Studies criticizes the Obama administration for its plan to move national security resources toward an Asia-Pacific focus and away from the Atlantic; study recommends that more must be done to persuade Congress to support and finance such as strategy.
lead_paragraph: The review said the Obama administration had not sufficiently explained how it would shift military forces and how it would pay for the moves.

headline.seo: Study Criticizes Pentagon Over Plans to Shift Focus to Asia
headline.main: Study Criticizes Pentagon Over Its Plans for a Greater Focus on Asia
headline.print_headline: Study Criticizes Pentagon Over Its Plans for a Greater Focus on Asia
